element.definition: The reason (purpose of use), specific to this participant, that was used during the event being recorded.
element.comments: Use participant.purposeOfUse when you know that is specific to the participant, otherwise use event.purposeOfEvent. For example, during a machine-to-machine transfer it might not be obvious to the audit system who caused the event, but it does know why.

binding.description: The reason the activity took place.
